title: Ticket #5808: Be able to pass result from one DAG node to another
description:
Just got a request today on htcondor-users to be able to pass the result from one node to another node: 

  JOB A foo.sub
  SCRIPT POST A bar.sh $RETURN
  JOB B bar.sub
  VARS B=$(RETURN)

That syntax wouldn't quite work, but maybe something like this would: 

  JOB A ...
  JOB B ...
  VARS B result="$RESULT(A)"
  SCRIPT PRE B my_script $RESULT(A)

Of course, this only works if job A has finished before job B runs. I'm not sure if we should require that B is a "descendant" of A, or if it should just be a run-time error if we get to B and A hasn't finished...

Also, if node A fails, and B is a descendant of A, B will never get run. So maybe this is only relevant if A has a POST script and we actually want the return value of A's HTCondor job, not node A as a whole.
